Name: Ecosphere - Prologue
About the game: You play as Leily Stirner, the Pirate Princess! Mandated by a mysterious mission's sponsor, she must infiltrate a memorial to steal an orb capable of controlling nature: the Ecosphere! But beware: each decision will impact the progress of your mission... Will you manage to steal the precious loot? This free prologue (about twenty minutes of non-linear visual novel's gameplay) will be the opportunity to lay the foundations of a much bigger universe! An atypical universe Enter a universe mixing Fantasy, Steampunk, and Pirates! A planet where magical powers meet technology. A world where humans are born with an Affinity: the mark that gives the ability to master one of the four natural elements! Interactive Fiction During the adventure, you will regularly have choices to decide the best way to enter the Memorial and influence the story. Two ends and several tactics to achieve them. Point & click Explore and interact with your environment using a drag-and-drop system: dragging items from your inventory and dropping them in-game to unlock contents. Battle mode Based on Quick Time Event, a battle mode is integrated for casting spells. Press the button before it's too late: if you click the attack button, you trigger the magic. If you miss it, the opponent attacks, and you suffer damage! Turbomedia It is a comic book designed for digital devices and exploits its technical possibilities, such as animations and interactions. An action sequence is available in this prologue. In-game rewards A gallery of 9 unlockable CGs and 6 achievements. Riocamy (Director, writer, programmer) - Zelyphia (Character artist) - DSittaro (Background artist) - UI, VFX and sound design are licensed from asset stores.
